decks.notes: The main idea of this deck is to utilize the Old Stickfingers commander to create a strong combo-based strategy. The deck includes a variety of cards that focus on reanimation, sacrificing creatures, and generating mana quickly. By using cards like Reanimate, Dark Ritual, and Yawgmoth's Will, the deck aims to quickly bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard and overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence. Additionally, cards like Tendrils of Agony and Toxic Deluge can serve as finishers to quickly end the game once the combo is in place. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to efficiently combo off using graveyard recursion and sacrifice effects to outmaneuver and defeat the opponent.

This deck revolves around using Aragorn, King of Gondor as the commander to lead an aggro strategy in a Duel Commander format. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures, powerful removal spells, disruptive counter magic, and versatile card draw spells. By utilizing cards like True-Name Nemesis and Skyclave Apparition to apply pressure on the opponent, combined with cards like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt for removal, the deck aims to control the board and maintain tempo in the early to mid-game. With a combination of card advantage engines like Teferi, Time Raveler and Snapcaster Mage, the deck can outvalue opponents in the late game. Overall, the deck focuses on a proactive game plan that aims to close out the game quickly while maintaining control of the battlefield.

The main objective of this deck is to assemble a powerful combo involving Prossh, Skyraider of Kher, and various sacrifice outlets and token generators. By sacrificing creatures and generating additional tokens, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a large army of creatures and trigger various synergies such as Blood Artist and Zulaport Cutthroat to drain opponents' life totals. The deck utilizes efficient ramp spells and mana rocks to accelerate its game plan, while also including disruptive spells like Abrupt Decay and Mind Twist to control the board and disrupt opponents' strategies. Ultimately, the deck seeks to combo off and win the game through a combination of creature sacrifice and life drain.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format. The commanders, Bruse Tarl and Yoshimaru, provide powerful combat abilities and synergies with the rest of the deck. The deck includes a mix of creatures with evasion and powerful equipment to deal consistent damage to the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes a suite of removal spells to deal with opposing threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By applying pressure early and maintaining control of the battlefield, the deck aims to close out games before the opponent can stabilize and mount a comeback.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive and fast plays, utilizing a variety of efficient and direct damage spells and creatures. The goal is to continuously apply pressure on the opponent, quickly depleting their life total before they can stabilize or mount a defense. This deck aims to control the board through constant aggression and burn spells, preventing the opponent from establishing a strong board presence. Cards like Lightning Bolt, Goblin Guide, and Chandra, Torch of Defiance help maintain momentum and ensure a quick victory. The deck revolves around utilizing the red color's direct damage spells and creatures to swiftly defeat the opponent in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

This deck focuses on utilizing the abilities of Slimefoot and Squee to create a fast and aggressive playstyle. By incorporating a mix of removal, ramp, and recursion spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats and pressure. Cards like Abrupt Decay, Lightning Bolt, and Fatal Push help control the board while creatures like Elves of Deep Shadow and Elvish Mystic accelerate mana production. With strong support from Goblin Bombardment and Scrapheap Scrounger, the deck can generate tokens and deal additional damage. Overall, the key strategy is to maintain a steady flow of creatures and spells to chip away at the opponent's life total and secure a victory through attrition.

This deck focuses on creating a fast and aggressive strategy with Slimefoot and Squee as the commanders. It includes a mix of efficient creatures, disruption spells, and powerful synergies to pressure the opponent and control the game. Cards like Goblin Bombardment, Phyrexian Altar, and Skullclamp provide ways to generate value and create a steady stream of threats. Additionally, the deck runs a suite of efficient removal spells and hand disruption to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes ways to accelerate mana production. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive, threatening, and resilient, capable of overwhelming opponents with its speed and versatility.
